name: Pandora Max Series Vol. 2: Shisha no Yobu Yakata
overview: Shisha no Yobu Yakata Pandora Max Series vol2 is a first person horror adventure game that features japanese character voices. The game's plot is about that the owner of the mansion offer three days and two nights tour. The six tour participants headed into the villa, but along the way, they take a shortcut that leads them to the forest and called them into the woods. And them the horror story begins. The game features over 1 hour and a half of horror adventure, there are also some mini games during the game like a card game, but since the game features over 28 different endings (some of them bad ones) the game could be played several times to be fully completed.
